name: Uni Adventures
description:
Made for the 'So Bad It's Good' 2021 Game Jam. This game is intentionally 'bad'. But hopefully it's as 'good' as it is 'bad'.

"You begin a new adventure in university!" - Bnig98JR

"University is torture. Enjoy" - EnderLlamas

"Why are we even here? Just to suffer." - Katanoueki

Welcome to Uni. Stress free and fun for all ages.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Mouse Controls Only
